relationships.description: Roth is the designer and design director at International Jet Interiors
IJI is refurbishing a Global 5000 aircraft for WWE

analysis.purpose: To showcase International Jet Interiors' aircraft customization services and highlight Eric Roth's design expertise
analysis.significance: Reveals high-end private jet customization industry serving wealthy clients including Donald Trump and WWE

notable_quotes: "The more unusual the request, the more Roth and his team seem to excel in delivering the solution"
"Clients come to me saying 'Eric, I want it to be luxuriously comfortable, very functional but extremely understated'"
"It will be the ultimate couture craft when completed in January 2014"
red_flags: Extreme luxury spending on private jets

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found in this promotional article

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity mentioned; this is a legitimate business article about aircraft interior design

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be from a luxury lifestyle or aviation trade publication (JetGala) featuring high-profile clients and luxury services

analysis.summary: This magazine article profiles International Jet Interiors and designer Eric Roth, showcasing their high-end private jet customization services for clients including Donald Trump and World Wrestling Entertainment, featuring luxurious amenities like 24-karat gold-plated fixtures and advanced entertainment systems.
